mapper.insert: INSERT INTO protocol_info( protocol_key, out_protocol_key, pay_receive_flag, online_protocol_flag, new_acct_amt error_max_num, error_continued_num, pay_channel, protocol_type, protocol_no, protocol_class, sign_no, sign_channel, send_recv_flag, bill_type, corp_code, corp_name, fee_item_code, send_bank_no send_settle_bank recv_bank_no, recv_settle_bank, msg_id, busi_type_code, busi_kind_code, subsys_busi_kind subsys_busi_type, payer_acct_type, payer_settle_bank, payer_bank, payer_bank_name, payer_open_bank, payer_open_bank_name, payer_acct_attr, payer_acct, payer_acct_name, payer_id_type payer_id_num, payer_mobile_no, payee_settle_bank, payee_bank, payee_bank_name, payee_open_bank, payee_open_bank_name, payee_acct_type, payee_acct_attr, payee_acct, payee_acct_name, payee_id_type, payee_id_num, payee_mobile_no, acct, acct_name, out_cust_no, customer_code, host_customer_no, addr, payer_tel_no, opponent_acct, opponent_name, single_min_amt, single_max_quota, day_cumulate_max, day_cumulate_limit, monthly_cumulate_max, monthly_cumulate_limit, curr_cumulate_date, day_cumulate_amt, day_draw_times, monthly_cumulate_amt, monthly_draw_times, effective_flag, effective_date, invalid_date, branch, entry_teller, check_date, maintain_date, maintain_time, release_date, release_time, plt_date, plt_time, busi_ext_params, product_reserve1, product_reserve2, product_reserve3, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, ext_field4, ext_field5, ext_field6, create_datetime, update_datetime, limit_key, limit_quota_flag, third_protocol_no, ) VALUES(#{id},#{name},#{password})
